targets.expr: avg by (VolumeID) (powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", VolumeID=~"$Volume", Namespace=~"$Namespace"})
avg by (VolumeID) (powermax_volume_total_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", VolumeID=~"$Volume", Namespace=~"$Namespace"})

count (predict_linear(powermax_volume_total_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 2 * 24 * 60 * 60) - predict_linear(powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 2 * 24 * 60 * 60) <= 0)
or
vector(0)

panels.title: PVs Full in 2 days - Based on Daily Usage

targets.expr:
count (predict_linear(powermax_volume_total_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 5 * 24 * 60 * 60) - predict_linear(powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 5 * 24 * 60 * 60) <= 0)
or
vector(0)

panels.title: PVs Full in 5 days - Based on Daily Usage

targets.expr:
count (predict_linear(powermax_volume_total_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 7 * 24 * 60 * 60) - predict_linear(powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"}[1d], 7 * 24 * 60 * 60) <= 0)
or
vector(0)

panels.title: PVs Full in 1 Week - Based on Daily Usage

targets.expr: count (powermax_volume_used_capacity_percentage{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace"} >= ${warning_threshold}) or vector (0)

count(powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace", PersistentVolumeStatus="Pending"}) or vector(0)

count(powermax_volume_used_capacity_gigabytes{ArrayID=~"$Array", PersistentVolumeClaimName=~"$PVCName", PersistentVolumeName=~"$PVName", Namespace=~"$Namespace", PersistentVolumeStatus="Failed"}) or vector(0)
